sentences.en: The inhibitors of phosphodiesterase -4 inhibit the inflammation reaction by regulating cytokine secretion.
sentences.cn: 磷酸二酯酶-4抑制剂通过调节细胞因子而抑制炎症反应。

sentences.en: The methods of 5'- phosphodiesterase extraction from malt root were studied in this paper.
sentences.cn: 主要研究了麦芽根中5′—磷酸二酯酶的提取方法.

sentences.en: The methods of 5'- phosphodiesterase extraction from malt root were studied in this paper.
sentences.cn: 主要研究了麦芽根中5'磷酸二酯酶的提取方法.

sentences.en: This same enzyme, phosphodiesterase type 5, also limits blood flow by contracting the muscles around blood vessels.
sentences.cn: 同一种酶，5型磷酸二酯酶也通过收缩血管壁平滑肌减少血流。
